-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 27, 2000 11:39 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Mages soloing..... err Grouping?


i'm sure it goes back to the "no bad classes, just bad players" argument.
the mages i have grouped with have always been great. and talk about a
group friendly spell, one of the best spells from kunark so far has got to
be the level 55 summon hero mage spell.

Shada Iceheart, L56 Wood Elf Troubador
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr


> Specific instances are not coming to mind at the moment, but
> I can say I
> have actually had more positive (or at least neutral) group
> experiences
> with mages than I have negative. Then again, I have so
> seldom grouped
> with mages in the last year+ that maybe I just got lucky.
